Dietary Norms Summary: Halal laws prohibit pork, blood, alcohol; ritual slaughter required
Geographic Prevalence: Middle East, North Africa, South Asia

Dietary Norms Summary: Kosher laws prohibit pork, shellfish; require ritual slaughter and meat-dairy separation
Many abstain from beef; majority vegetarian or lacto-vegetarian; fasting days common
Predominantly vegetarian; strict sects avoid all meat, eggs, garlic/onion
Fasting periods prohibit meat, dairy, eggs; common in Lent and Advent
Lenten fasting and meat abstention on Fridays; less restrictive overall
Highly diverse; includes vegetarianism, veganism, flexitarianism
